	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
		</head>
		<body cc-root>
			Hello world.
		</body>
	</html>
	
------
parser

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
+			<script>
+				var foo = {};
+				foo.bar = 'Circular';
+			</script>
		</head>
		<body cc-root>
+			{{foo.bar}}
		</body>
	</html>
	
------
	
	document.title = 'Hello'
	
------
context

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
			<script>
				var foo = {};
				foo.bar = 'Circular';
			</script>
		</head>
+		<body cc-root cc-context=“foo”>
+			{{#bar}}
		</body>
	</html>
	

------
style

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
+			<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="demo-01.css">
			<script>
				var foo = {};
				foo.bar = 'Circular';
			</script>
		</head>
		<body cc-root cc-context=“{{foo}}”>
+			<h1>{{#bar}}</h1> 
		</body>
	</html>

------
binding

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
			<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="demo-01.css">
			<script>
				var foo = {};
				foo.bar = 'Circular';
			</script>
		</head>
		<body cc-root cc-context=“{{foo}}”>
+			<h1>{[#bar]} static expression</h1> 
			<h1>{{#bar}} binding expression</h1>
		</body>
	</html>
	
------
	
		foo.bar = 'Example'

------
javascript expressions

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
			<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="demo-01.css">
			<script>
				var foo = {};
				foo.bar = 'Circular';
			</script>
		</head>
		<body cc-root cc-context=“{{foo}}”>
			<h1>{{#bar}}</h1> 
+			<xmp>
+				{{1+1}}
+				{{alert('boo')}}
+				{{#this}}
+				{{@config.version}}
+				{{@log.write('boo')}}
+			</xmp>
		</body>
	</html>
	
------
cc-debug, cc-content

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
			<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="demo-01.css">
		</head>
		<body cc-root cc-context="{{document}}">
+			<section>
				<h1>{{#title}}</h1> 
+				<span cc-debug cc-content="boo"></span>
+			</section>
		</body>
	</html>
	
------
model

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
			<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="demo-01.css">
+			<script>
+				var Model = {
+					pages : {
+						hello : {
+							title 	: 'Hello',
+							content	: 'hello happy world'
+						}
+					}
+				}
			</script>
		</head>
+		<body cc-root cc-context="{{Model.pages.hello}}">
			<section>
				<h1>{{#title}}</h1> 
-
+				<p>{{#content}}</p>
			</section>
		</body>
	</html>

------

Model.pages.hello.title = 'Goodbye'


	
------
3waybinding

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
			<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="demo-01.css">
			<script>
				var Model = {
					pages : {
						hello : {
							title 	: 'Hello',
							content	: 'hello happy world'
+						},
+						goodbye : {
+							title 	: 'Goodbye',
+							content	: 'goodbye cruel world'						
+						}
					}
				}
			</script>
		</head>
		<body cc-root cc-context="{{Model.pages.hello}}">
			<h1>{{#title}}</h1> 
			<p>{{#content}}</p>
		</body>
	</html>

------

>> <body cc-root cc-context="{{Model.pages.goodbye}}">

------
control

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
			<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="demo-01.css">
			<script>
				var Model = {
					pages : {
						hello : {
							title 	: 'Hello',
							content	: 'hello happy world'
						},
						goodbye : {
							title 	: 'Goodbye',
							content	: 'goodbye cruel world'						
						}
					}
				}
+				var Control	= {
+					currentpage : Model.pages.hello,
+					goto				: function(page) {
+						this.currentpage = Model.pages[page]
+					}
+				}
			</script>
		</head>
		<body cc-root cc-context="{{Control.currentpage}}">
			<h1>{{#title}}</h1> 
			<p>{{#content}}</p>
		</body>
	</html>
	
	
------
	
Control.goto('goodbye')	
	
------
cc-loop

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
			<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="demo-01.css">
			<script>
				var Model = {
					pages : {
						hello : {
							title 	: 'Hello',
							content	: 'hello happy world'
						},
						goodbye : {
							title 	: 'Goodbye',
							content	: 'goodbye cruel world'						
						}
					}
				}
				var Control	= {
					currentpage : Model.pages.hello,
					goto				: function(page) {
						this.currentpage = Model.pages[page]
					}
				}
			</script>
		</head>
		<body cc-root cc-context="{{Control.currentpage}}">
+			<nav cc-loop="{{Model.pages}}">
+				{{#title}} 
+			</nav>
			<h1>{{#title}}</h1> 
			<p>{{#content}}</p>
		</body>
	</html>
	
------
cc-hide

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
			<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="demo-01.css">
			<script>
				var Model = {
					pages : {
						hello : {
							title 	: 'Hello',
							content	: 'hello happy world'
						},
						goodbye : {
							title 	: 'Goodbye',
							content	: 'goodbye cruel world'						
						}
					}
				}
				var Control	= {
					currentpage : Model.pages.hello,
					goto				: function(page) {
						this.currentpage = Model.pages[page]
					}
				}
			</script>
		</head>
		<body cc-root cc-context="{{Control.currentpage}}">
			<nav cc-loop="{{Model.pages}}">
				{{#title}}
+				<span cc-hide="{[@loop.last]}">|</span>
			</nav>
			<h1>{{#title}}</h1> 
			<p>{{#content}}</p>
		</body>
	</html>
	
------
@loop.key

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
			<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="demo-01.css">
			<script>
				var Model = {
					pages : {
						hello : {
							title 	: 'Hello',
							content	: 'hello happy world'
						},
						goodbye : {
							title 	: 'Goodbye',
							content	: 'goodbye cruel world'						
						}
					}
				}
				var Control	= {
					currentpage : Model.pages.hello,
					goto				: function(page) {
						this.currentpage = Model.pages[page]
					}
				}
			</script>
		</head>
		<body cc-root cc-context="{{Control.currentpage}}">
			<nav cc-loop="{{Model.pages}}">
+				<a onclick="Control.goto('{[@loop.key]}')">
+					{{#title}}
+				</a>
				<span cc-hide="{[@loop.last]}">|</span>
			</nav>
			<h1>{{#title}}</h1> 
			<p>{{#content}}</p>
		</body>
	</html>
	
------
@loop.key

	<html>
		<head>
			<title>Circular</title>
			<script src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.11.3.min.js"></script>
			<script src="http://circularjs.net/current/js/circular.min.js"></script>
			<link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="demo-01.css">
			<script>
				var Model = {
					pages : {
						hello : {
							title 	: 'Hello',
							content	: 'hello happy world'
						},
						goodbye : {
							title 	: 'Goodbye',
							content	: 'goodbye cruel world'						
						}
					}
				}
				var Control	= {
					currentpage : Model.pages.hello,
					goto				: function(page) {
						this.currentpage = Model.pages[page]
					}
				}
			</script>
		</head>
		<body cc-root cc-context="{{Control.currentpage}}">
			<nav cc-loop="{{Model.pages}}">
+				<a class="{{(Control.currentpage==#this)?'current':''}}" 
						onclick="Control.goto('{[@loop.key]}')">
					{{#title}}
				</a>
				<span cc-hide="{[@loop.last]}">|</span>
			</nav>
			<h1>{{#title}}</h1> 
			<p>{{#content}}</p>
		</body>
	</html>
